services.name: Express
services.description: Express consultation gives you personalized know-how for a chosen day.
details: Are you planning an important event?
Are you choosing a date for a wedding or business opening?
Curious to know the guidance of the Aura-Soma angels?
Then an express consultation is what you need!

services.name: Classic
services.description: A classic Aura-Soma consultation reveals your unique gifts and mission.
details: Reveals your unique gifts and mission of the spirit
Shows your past-present-future timeline
Helps you find answers to life situations
Revives inspiration and confidence on your path

services.name: Mega
services.description: Mega-consultation reveals all the sides and keys of Aura-Soma.
details: Includes entire Classic consultation
Determination of your individual equilibrium in Aura-Soma
Aura treatment with Aura-Soma pomander
Trends on your timeline
How others see you
Practical tips on the Path of destiny and much more

services.name: Aura-Soma 2025
services.description: Get a colourful, inspiring, and most unusual year forecast for 2025.
details: Main leitmotifs and description of 2025 with Aura-Soma products

services.name: Mandala
services.description: Personalised mandala reading for those who enjoy painting or coloring mandalas.
details: Do you like to paint or color mandalas?
Want to know what stands behind your colours?
Get your personalised mandala reading

services.name: Aura Treatments
services.description: Treatments to address negative emotions, stress, and other issues affecting aura quality.
details: Addresses negative emotions, stress, harmful habits, diseases, unhealthy lifestyle
Counteracts collective electromagnetic spectrum and other life issues that lower aura vibrations and quality
